content: over p1 repeat from * to end of round 105 sts round 2 *p1 k1 p2 k1 yo k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round finishing 120 sts cut yarn leaving 9 tail thread yarn through remaining sts rnds 3 and 4 *p1 k1 p2 k3 p1 repeat from * to end of round and pull tight weave in ends all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 12/14/12 © fairmount fibers ltd 2012 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 3 of 3
